item.title: Stagwell Inc 10-K
item.description: Stagwell Inc, which is in the Services-Advertising Agencies [7311] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 17, 2022 had 42988 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 582 instances 2021 - 394 instances may - 374 instances financial - 347 instances december - 339 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
